20110130013111.000|20110130013113.000|CC1|LEFT MORE THAN 70 DEAD AND MORE

20110130013823.000|20110130013826.000|CC1|>> Reporter: ANWAR SADAT WAS

20110130014838.000|20110130014840.000|CC1|CONNECT THE TWO CONTINENTS,
